lines.text:
[to Tiger]
I have done such a terrible nice thing, Father. I have fall in love.
Day after day Tiger watched Toyo's happiness grow... but it was always through eyes filled with fear.

[to Toyo]
Well, I don't like him! I'm not trusting your happiness to any young whipper-snapper like that!
You are unchanged, Tiger... except for some new scars.
No, I haven't changed any... neither have you.

[to Mme. de Sylva about Bobby]
Your heathen tricks have broken enough men! You're going to leave this one alone!

[to Tiger about Mme. de Sylva and Bobby]
She's bad. White boy is like sheep with tiger. Take him away!

[Seductively to Bobby]
My East will be your East until you love it. I promise.

[to Bobby about Mme. de Sylva]
I'd sooner see one of the tigers get you... than her.
